ðŸ“– Summary: Erys is a terminal interface for Jupyter Notebooks, enabling users to open, create, edit, run, and save notebooks and other text files directly from the terminal. It leverages Textual for the interface and jupyter_client for code execution, providing a streamlined workflow for developers who prefer a terminal-based environment.
